0: Joe Sanger at pool bar always has a classy way about him
We ate food by the pool and it was delicious
Bustling lobby great for meeting up with people very nice pool area with outdoor bar
The 24hour workout room and pool with generous hours are great retreats as well
We had a wonderful view and the pool was great as well
The pool was nice and I was very happy to find the pool side bar restaurant
Pool attendant was very helpful too
We had a fantastic view the pool area was lively during the day and romanticals at night
The chef has a herb garden on the pool deck and incorporates the herbs in his menu
1: I specifically booked at this hotel for a wedding weekend to be able to spend Saturday by the pool
Awesome except pool was under renovation I wish I had been told at booking time
The price was decent because they were doing some construction on the pool but we were not about to swim in February
Although the property is very nice and right on the River Walk the pool was closed
Pool and hot tub area under construction
You are allowed to use Embassy Suites pool
While we were staying here the pool was out of service
2: The drinks at the pool were very watered down and we both did not Iike our cocktail
We also did not take advantage of their spa fitness center or rooftop pool we spent all of our time ofsite enjoying the Florida Aquarium Ybor City and the Tampa Riverwalk
BUT when we went to the pool the next day there were obviously some women that were working the male crowd
The outside pool area in this hotel in on the third floor rooftop
I am a local that lives on harbor island i took my family to the mariot hotel pool to get out of the house and get some much needed hurricane stress relief
The pool was warm and salt water
Next time we are trying something from the egg grill at the pool
I went to the Mariot waterside hotel and went to the pool last Saturday or Sunday
Well i did nt know i had to get my food all the way across the pool
We wound up booking a cabana for multiple days hung out and had a relaxing time at the pool
